mapper.select: SELECT SUM(leadsCnt) leadsCnt, SUM(leadsUserCnt) leadsUserCnt, SUM(actualConsume) actualConsume, bt bt FROM ( SELECT SUM(leads_cnt) leadsCnt, SUM(leads_user_cnt) leadsUserCnt, SUM(actual_consume) actualConsume, bt bt FROM yiche_app_app_leads_channel_day_all WHERE bt = #{date} AND channel_id IN (SELECT channel_id FROM imp_platform_channel WHERE platform_name="易车APP") UNION SELECT SUM(leads_cnt) leadsCnt, SUM(leads_user_cnt) leadsUserCnt, SUM(actual_consume) actualConsume, bt bt FROM yiche_quote_app_leads_channel_day_all WHERE bt = #{date} AND channel_id IN (SELECT channel_id FROM imp_platform_channel WHERE platform_name="报价APP") UNION SELECT SUM(cluecount) leadsCnt, SUM(clueusercount) leadsUserCnt, SUM(actual_consume) actualConsume, dt bt FROM yiche_pcwap_app_leads_channel_day_all WHERE dt = #{date} AND channel_id IN (SELECT channel_id FROM imp_platform_channel WHERE platform_name="PCWAP") ) yiche_sum_day_report

SELECT platformName platformName, leadsCnt leadsCnt, leadsUserCnt leadsUserCnt, actualConsume actualConsume, bt bt FROM ( SELECT "易车APP" platformName, SUM(leads_cnt) leadsCnt, SUM(leads_user_cnt) leadsUserCnt, SUM(actual_consume) actualConsume, bt bt FROM yiche_app_app_leads_channel_day_all WHERE bt = #{date} AND channel_id IN (SELECT channel_id FROM imp_platform_channel WHERE platform_name="易车APP") UNION SELECT "报价APP" platformName, SUM(leads_cnt) leadsCnt, SUM(leads_user_cnt) leadsUserCnt, SUM(actual_consume) actualConsume, bt bt FROM yiche_quote_app_leads_channel_day_all WHERE bt = #{date} AND channel_id IN (SELECT channel_id FROM imp_platform_channel WHERE platform_name="报价APP") UNION SELECT "PCWAP" platformName, SUM(cluecount) leadsCnt, SUM(clueusercount) leadsUserCnt, SUM(actual_consume) actualConsume, dt bt FROM yiche_pcwap_app_leads_channel_day_all WHERE dt = #{date} AND channel_id IN (SELECT channel_id FROM imp_platform_channel WHERE platform_name="PCWAP") ) yiche_platformName_day_report WHERE platformName=#{platformName}

SELECT platformName, channelName, leadsCnt, leadsUserCnt, actualConsume, bt, newUserCnt, newUserCost, systemId FROM ( SELECT "易车APP" platformName, a.channel_name channelName, a.leads_cnt leadsCnt, a.leads_user_cnt leadsUserCnt, a.actual_consume actualConsume, a.bt bt, a.new_user_cnt newUserCnt, a.new_user_cost newUserCost, b.system_id systemId FROM yiche_app_app_leads_channel_day_all a, imp_platform_channel b WHERE a.bt = #{date} AND a.channel_id = b.channel_id AND b.system_id =#{systemId} AND platform_name="易车APP" UNION SELECT "报价APP" platformName, a.channel_name channelName, a.leads_cnt leadsCnt, a.leads_user_cnt leadsUserCnt, a.actual_consume actualConsume, a.bt bt, a.new_user_cnt newUserCnt, a.new_user_cost newUserCost, b.system_id systemId FROM yiche_quote_app_leads_channel_day_all a, imp_platform_channel b WHERE a.bt = #{date} AND a.channel_id = b.channel_id AND b.system_id =#{systemId} AND platform_name="报价APP" ) yiche_quote_platform WHERE platformName=#{platformName}

SELECT "PCWAP" platformName, a.channel_name channelName, a.cluecount leadsCnt, a.clueusercount leadsUserCnt, a.actual_consume actualConsume, a.dt bt, b.terminal_id FROM yiche_pcwap_app_leads_channel_day_all a, imp_platform_channel b WHERE a.dt = #{date} AND a.channel_id = b.channel_id AND b.terminal_id =#{terminalId}
